meanings.definition: A person or thing that throws.
meanings.sent1: The throwers at the baseball game impressed the crowd with their strong arms.
meanings.sent2: The throwers in the competition showed off their skills in shot put and javelin.
meanings.sent3: The throwers at the food fight were the most accurate, hitting their targets with precision.
meanings.sent4: The throwers of ideas in the meeting sparked a lively discussion among the team.
meanings.sent5: The throwers of confetti made the celebration even more festive and colorful.

meanings.sent1: The team of throwers won the championship with their combined strength.
meanings.sent2: The throwers gathered around the campfire to share stories of their adventures.
meanings.sent3: The throwers in the relay race passed the baton smoothly, ensuring a quick exchange.
meanings.sent4: The throwers of parties in the neighborhood always knew how to liven up the street.
meanings.sent5: The throwers of snowballs covered the yard in a blanket of white during the winter storm.
